targets.rawSql: SELECT temp AS "Temperature", app_temp AS "Apparent Temperature", datetime AS time FROM weather_data
SELECT rh AS "Relative Humidity", datetime AS "Time" FROM weather_data
SELECT clouds, datetime AS Time FROM weather_data
SELECT precip AS "Precipitation", datetime AS "Time" FROM weather_data
SELECT wind_spd AS "Wind Speed", gust AS "Wind Gust Speed", datetime AS "Time" FROM weather_data
SELECT solar_rad AS "Solar Radiation", dni AS "Direct Normal Solar Irradiance", dhi AS "Diffuse Horizontal Solar Irradiance", datetime AS Time FROM weather_data
SELECT aqi AS "Air Quality", datetime AS Time FROM weather_data

SELECT effective_utc AS "Date", title AS "Title", regions AS "Regions", description AS "Description" FROM weather_alerts WHERE DATE(effective_utc) >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '14 days' ORDER BY effective_utc DESC
SELECT MAX(temp) AS "Max", MIN(temp) AS "Min" FROM weather_data
SELECT MAX(app_temp) AS "Max", MIN(app_temp) AS "Min" FROM weather_data
SELECT MAX(precip) AS "Max Precipitation" FROM weather_data
SELECT MAX(wind_spd) AS "Max Wind Speed" FROM weather_data
SELECT MAX(aqi) AS "Max", MIN(aqi) AS "Min" FROM weather_data LIMIT 50
